snippet: Law firms and consultants reached agreements with Detroit over fees they charged the city for work on its bankruptcy, federal court mediators said Thursday.
abstract: Law firms and consultants reach agreements with Detroit over fees they charged city for work on its bankruptcy; agreements are subject to approval by Judge Steven Rhodes. who had overseen bankruptcy proceedings.
lead_paragraph: Law firms and consultants reached agreements with Detroit over fees they charged the city for work on its bankruptcy, federal court mediators said Thursday.

headline.main: Michigan: Deal on Legal Fees for Detroit Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Deal on Legal Fees for Detroit Bankruptcy
